home.descripcion: Strategic contribution and value creation in communications, public affairs, and institutional marketing.

nuestraEmpresa.text1: At our consultancy, we combine experience, strategy, and commitment to build strong relationships between brands, the media, and society.
nuestraEmpresa.text2: We support companies and institutions in projects to strengthen corporate identity in order to improve the company's overall positioning and consolidate its presence in the market.

slides.text: Formed by a team of professionals with proven experience and results in top-level international companies and organizations, focused on providing creative, value-added solutions tailored to each client.
We are a consultancy specialized in strategic communication, focused on Media Relations, Public Affairs, and Promotional Marketing.
Member of the Consultancy Committee of the Professional Council of Public Relations and the Association of Argentine Journalistic Entities (ADEPA).
We stand out for our active involvement in the services we provide and our continuous follow-up.

parentesisHome.text1: We support individuals, companies, institutions, and organizations in creating strategies to improve their positioning with their stakeholders, strengthening a positive image and minimizing risks.

elecciones2025.descripcion:
ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡· Elections 2025: key support and new challenges for the administration 

The results redefined the national political balance and marked a turning point: La Libertad Avanza obtained 40.6% nationwide, achieving strong legislative growth and consolidating its political weight. 

At SpE Consultores, we analyzed in detail how power is being reconfigured in Congress and what scenarios this new landscape opens for the coming months. 

ğŸ“Š Key points of the new scenario: 

âœ”ï¸ The ruling party will gain access to 93 of its own deputies and more than 20 PRO allies, placing it just a few votes away from quorum. 
âœ”ï¸ In the Senate, it triples its representation, going from 6 to 20 seats and retaining 6 of the 8 provinces renewing positions.
âœ”ï¸ Opportunities open up to move forward with the Budget and fiscal, labor, and pension reforms.
âœ”ï¸ A stage of direct dialogue with governors and macroeconomic consolidation begins.
âœ”ï¸ â€œTwo out of three Argentines do not want to return to the past. Populism never again. We are going to push forward reforms and envision the country alongside other forces.â€ â€” highlighted the President.
âœ”ï¸ TMAP â€” Everything is going according to plan: the new parliamentary balance reinforces the continuity of the economic and political direction, initiating a phase where votes must turn into consensus and concrete results.

ğŸ“¤ Access the full report and discover how the outcome redefines the legislative agenda, the economy, and the power strategy for the upcoming months.
#Elections2025 #PoliticalAnalysis #ElectoralScenario #Governability #Economy #SPEConsultores #PoliticalIntelligence #ElectoralTrends

theFoodMarket.descripcion:
âœ¨ Ten years ago, The Food Market was born with a purpose: to transform the way we consume. Today, it celebrates its first decade as a certified B Corporation.

This recognition is more than just a seal: it is proof that businesses can grow while caring for people and the planet.

As part of the Farmacity ecosystem, The Food Market strengthens its commitment to sustainability and innovation.

At SPE Consultores, we are proud to have accompanied the brand on this journey, contributing our expertise to achieve a positive and sustainable impact together.

#PurposeDrivenCompanies #BCorporation #Sustainability #TheFoodMarket

impulsamosTuCom.text: We provide experience, strategy, and commitment to strengthen the relationship between your organization, the media, and society. Our team offers close and continuous support for every project.

FabianFalco.bio:
He developed comprehensive communication and relationship-building campaigns for politicians, media outlets, institutions, and companies.

He served as Chairman of the Board of El Cronista Comercial S.A. for two years.

For more than 8 years, he was Director of Communications and External Relations at Repsol YPF for Argentina, Brazil, and Bolivia, with direct responsibility over: Institutional Relations, Press, Advertising, Market Research, Marketing, Corporate Identity, E-marketing, Public Relations, Events, and Corporate Social Responsibility.

Between 1993 and 2001, he held the position of Director of External Communications and Marketing at Aguas Argentinas (Operator: Suez Group).

Between 1987 and 1993, he served as Head of Communications and Press at the Bridas Group.

He worked as a professional journalist in various national and regional media outlets.

In 2007, he received the Konex Platinum Award as the most outstanding figure in Institutional Communication of the decade. In 2004, he received the Jerry Goldenberg Award for Communication Excellence and the award from the Public Relations Professional Council.
